definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
hand-mixed drink (of the kind sold at a bubble tea shop)

sentences.english: Recovery of marketable kernels with a hand cracking machine averaged only 17 %.
sentences.chinese: 应用手摇破碎机获得的商品核桃仁仅为17%。

sentences.english: The racing push cars at The Green Exhibition of I-Lan.
sentences.chinese: 宜兰县绿色博览会中的铁道竞速手摇车。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a hand-operated water basin dish-washing machine, which belongs to a household kitchen appliance.
sentences.chinese: 一种手摇式水槽洗碗机，属于家庭厨房用具。

sentences.english: A barrel-organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.chinese: 一架手摇风琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子。

sentences.english: Put the suspension coop on the base, install suspension shaft and hand crane.
sentences.chinese: 将吊笼放到底座上，装上吊杆及手摇起重机。

sentences.english: Then, also has bought a trolley for her, pushed out to see the sun.
sentences.chinese: 接着，又为她买了一个手摇车，推出去见太阳。

sentences.english: Prior to running, turn the hand-crank of the pump to get the cylinders being lubricated beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前运行，关闭泵的手摇得到气瓶被事先润滑。

sentences.english: Give your hand a shake shake shake and turn yourself about.
sentences.chinese: 把你的手摇啊摇啊摇，再来转个圈。

sentences.english: The working mechanism includes the lifting mechanism and hand crane.
sentences.chinese: 工作机构包括提升机构和手摇起重机。

sentences.english: Manual hydraulic lift models include a front-accessible hand crank.
sentences.chinese: 手动液压升降型号包括前端可手摇手柄。

sentences.english: At present, the existence and widespread use of the hand-style sweet potato slicer.
sentences.chinese: 目前广泛存在和使用的是手摇式红薯切片机。

sentences.english: One technique is to use power reaming to penetrate the first cortex and then switch to hand reaming.
sentences.chinese: 可以用电钻突破第一层皮质，然后换成手摇钻扩孔。

definition: a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
to operate by means of a pedal
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
